--- ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: ## Tidy data >Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way. > >Leo Tolstoy -- .pull-left[ **Characteristics of tidy data:** - Each variable forms a column. - Each observation forms a row. - Each type of observational unit forms a table. ] -- .pull-right[ **Characteristics of untidy data:** !@#$%^&*() ] --- ## .question[ What makes this data not tidy? ] ::: {.cell layout-align="center" caption='WW2 Army Air Force combat aircraft'} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](img/hyperwar-airplanes-on-hand.png){fig-align='center' width=70%} ::: ::: .footnote[ Source: [Army Air Forces Statistical Digest, WW II](https://www.ibiblio.org/hyperwar/AAF/StatDigest/aafsd-3.html) ] --- .question[ What makes this data not tidy? ]
::: {.cell layout-align="center" caption='Estimated HIV prevalence among 15-49 year olds'} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](img/hiv-est-prevalence-15-49.png){fig-align='center' width=70%} ::: ::: .footnote[ Source: [Gapminder, Estimated HIV prevalence among 15-49 year olds](https://www.gapminder.org/data) ] --- .question[ What makes this data not tidy? ]
::: {.cell layout-align="center" caption='US General Economic Characteristics, ACS 2017'} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](img/us-general-economic-characteristic-acs-2017.png){fig-align='center' width=85%} ::: ::: .footnote[ Source: [US Census Fact Finder, General Economic Characteristics, ACS 2017](https://factfinder.census.gov/faces/tableservices/jsf/pages/productview.xhtml?pid=ACS_17_5YR_DP03&src=pt) ] --- ## Displaying vs. summarising data .panelset[ .panel[.panel-name[Output] .pull-left[ ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 87 × 3 name height mass 1 Luke Skywalker 172 77 2 C-3PO 167 75 3 R2-D2 96 32 4 Darth Vader 202 136 5 Leia Organa 150 49 6 Owen Lars 178 120 # … with 81 more rows ``` ::: ::: ] .pull-right[ ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 3 × 2 gender avg_ht 1 feminine 165. 2 masculine 177. 3 181. ``` ::: ::: ] ] .panel[.panel-name[Code] .pull-left[ ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} starwars %>% select(name, height, mass) ``` ::: ] .pull-right[ ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} starwars %>% group_by(gender) %>% summarize( avg_ht = mean(height, na.rm = TRUE) ) ``` ::: ] ] ]
